description: This init just includes the codemirror plugin. If XH plugin codeeditor ist present, the View Source Code will be executed by codemirror. The theme will be taken from the codeeditor setting.
plugins: accordion anchor autolink autosave charmap code codesample emoticons fontawesome fullscreen help image importcss insertdatetime link lists media nonbreaking preview quickbars save searchreplace table visualblocks visualchars wordcount xhplugincall
toolbar: save undo blocks bold italic link unlink image alignleft aligncenter alignright bullist numlist
menubar: edit insert view format table tools help
block_formats: Paragraph=p; Header 1=h1; Header 2=h2; Header 3=h3; Header 4=h4; Header 5=h5; Header 6=h6; Div=div; Code=code; Pre=pre; Blockquote=blockquote
